tool_description: We're thrilled to introduce the Checky API, a powerful fraud detection tool designed to secure credit card transactions. This credit card transaction fraud detection embodies cutting-edge technology that sets new standards in identifying and preventing fraudulent activities in real-time.
name: Checky - Fraud Detection API
title: Checky - Fraud Detection API

api_list.name: Predict Fraud (GET)
api_list.description: Use a state-of-the-art model to predict the likelihood of fraud in financial transactions based on provided transaction data. Utilizing advanced algorithms, it assesses various parameters associated with the transaction to determine the probability of fraudulent activity. Requires query parameters.

required_parameters.name: job
required_parameters.description:
Job Type of the User
 [Check the available options here -->](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/checky-fraud-detection-api/tutorials/trained-'job'-values)

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description:
Transaction Category
[Check the available options here -->](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/checky-fraud-detection-api/tutorials/trained-'category'-values)

required_parameters.name: dob
required_parameters.description: Date of Birth of the User Performing the Transaction

required_parameters.name: city_pop
required_parameters.description: Population of the City where the Transaction Occurs
